title: About my Leave Buster
body:
I had to leave to restart the games several times as my League of Legends games was bugged. The client started being laggy i didnt think that it was going ot be an issue till my ranked game started. The game started and everything was wrong, not sure why i had over 120 ping constantly but the main issue was the whole game seemed like it was going in slowmotion or buffering. I have a  video on my phone showing it but not sure how to post it on here but now I have been punished for i guess having a poop computer...

Also, what's Lower Priority Queue?

replies.body:
This definitely seems like a pretty strange issue.  If the entire game was moving forward at what seems a snail pace, there may be an issue with your computers ability to render the game properly.  In order to hopefully resolve this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [FPS Troubleshooting Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684).

Also, you can find out what the hell Lower Priotity Queue is in our [LeaverBuster Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714#h2).

Let me know if nothing seems to help!
I had to restart my laptop for it to resolve but by the time i joined back I had the timer :(. Still trying to find a way to show the video here so you can see.

"Minecraft" "Big Black Narwhals" "Plebs~ c;" "SoloQHell"

I am so done.
Haven't played mc in about 6 months, The clubs are just friends that tell me to join
